BadgeDetail.Name: Reflective
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can analyse their learning experience. During induction, they have shown they can observe their own process of learning. They can identify strengths and areas for development and use this knowledge to improve their performance.

Task.Title: Reflect
Task.Body: Reflect on your overall induction experience. What have you learnt about yourself and your approach to learning? What do you think you will need to do differently to be successful at college? Upload your reflection as either video, audio or text.
Task.HtmlBody:
Reflect on your overall induction experience. What have you learnt about yourself and your approach to learning? What do you think you will need to do differently to be successful at college?

Upload your reflection as either video, audio or text.
